feature1.explanation: Both texts exhibit a similar use of punctuation marks such as hyphens, parentheses, and quotation marks.

feature2.explanation: There is consistency in lexical and grammatical features across both texts in terms of word choice and part of speech usage.

feature3.explanation: Sentence structure and complexity are comparable in both texts, contributing to a similar overall style.

feature4.explanation: Both texts share common narrative styles and tone, suggesting a potential similarity in authorship.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were found in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistency in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, as well as the absence of spelling errors, there is a moderate to high likelihood that the two texts were written by the same author.
